Html:
Hi,

I am unable to get the OpenId affiliate @ MyOpenId to work. After having setup my affiliate account at MyOpenId when I try to Create a New OpenId from KIGG or try to Login with an existing OpenId I keep getting the below error.

"return_to http://mydomain.com/OpenId not under realm http://www.mydomain.com/OpenId"

Here are the settings I used to create an OpenId affiliate account at www.myopenid.com

Site URL : http://mydomain.com/

Site Realm: http://mydomain.com

Login Form Action URL: http://mydomain.com/OpenId

 

Can someone please help me and let me know where I am going wrong.

Many Thanks

Did you edit the web.config file to set your "RootUrl"?

Look in the <containers> section for "IConfigurationSettings". There are several properties which you will probably want to set.

Hi vinodkumarv:

Did you fix the problem? If yes how? I have the simillar problem.
Nope.. I was not able to get it fixed. I tried all sorts of things (including editing all sorts of entries in the web.config) but could not get it to work. So I took out the OpenId feature :)
I guess the reason is you are using IIS6, I realized II7 is the best server for DotNetOpenID so i've switched my shared host to IIS7.
